body_html:
@x10000year Do you need it (gpu kernerl for scatter_nd)? Would you like to create a pull request and make the contribution? Take a try to fix it.

The test file of scatter_nd is here. If I'm not wrong, we could fix scatter_nd by the similar way as we do in PR #20244.
body_text:
@x10000year Do you need it (gpu kernerl for scatter_nd)? Would you like to create a pull request and make the contribution? Take a try to fix it.
The test file of scatter_nd is here. If I'm not wrong, we could fix scatter_nd by the similar way as we do in PR #20244.
body:
@x10000year Do you need it (gpu kernerl for `scatter_nd`)? Would you like to create a pull request and make the contribution? Take a try to fix it. 

The test file of `scatter_nd` is [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/cb401f09be5b816e704a70babc0facad63e84636/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/scatter_nd_ops_test.py#L146). If I'm not wrong, we could fix `scatter_nd` by the similar way as we do in PR #20244.
